title: ExperienceState
description: Distinct state that the experience can be in (works across all channels)

initial.description: When true, marks this as the starting state of the state machine. Only one ExperienceState per state machine should have initial: true.

channel.description: Delivery channel context for this experience state.

onEnter.description: List of StateAction specNodeIds executed when entering this state (lifecycle: on-enter).

onExit.description: List of StateAction specNodeIds executed when leaving this state (lifecycle: on-exit).

transitions.description: List of StateTransition specNodeIds owned by this state, defining the outgoing edges of the state machine.

enabledComponents.description: List of component specNodeIds that are interactive (enabled) when this state is active. Corresponds to ARIA aria-disabled=false.

disabledComponents.description: List of component specNodeIds that are non-interactive (disabled) when this state is active. Corresponds to ARIA aria-disabled=true.

hiddenComponents.description: List of component specNodeIds that are not rendered when this state is active. Corresponds to ARIA aria-hidden=true or display:none.
